citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
Environmental enhancements are currently utilized in all bird housing areas. The written plan is in place and being
implemented. However, it has yet to be approved by the attending veterinarian. Approved written plans for bird
enhancements are necessary to ensure that are birds are provided the necessary enrichments for their health and well-
being.
Dealers, exhibitors, and research facilities must develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate plan for
environment enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of birds. The plan must be approved by the
attending veterinarian and must be in accordance with the regulations in this subpart and with currently accepted
professional standards as cited in appropriate professional journals or reference guides.
TO BE CORRECTED BY: MARCH 1, 2024
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the facility representative.
n

Dealers, exhibitors, and research facilities must develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate plan for
